query: 如图,已知四边形ABCD内接于⊙O,直径AC=6,对角线AC、BD交于E点,且AB=BD,EC=1,则AD的长为()选项：['\\frac{3√{15}}{2}', '\\frac{17}{3}', '\\frac{11}{2}', '3√{2}']
answer: 解:如图,连接BO并延长交AD于点F,连接OD,∵OD=OA,BD=BA,∴BO为AD的垂直平分线,∵AC为直径,∴CD⊥AD,∴∠BFA=∠CDA,∴BO∥CD,∴△CDE∽△OBE,∴\frac{CD}{BO}=\frac{CE}{OE},∵OB=OC=3,CE=1,∴OE=2,∴\frac{CD}{3}=\frac{1}{2},∴CD=\frac{3}{2},在Rt△ACD中,由勾股定理可得AD=√{AC²-CD²}=√{6²-(\frac{3}{2})²}=√{\frac{135}{4}}=\frac{3√{15}}{2},故选:A．
